_description: Frontend React/Next.js application for the GiftSync gift recommendation platform. Built with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modern React patterns for optimal user experience and developer productivity.
name: giftsync-web
description: GiftSync Web Application - AI-powered gift recommendation platform with swipe-based discovery
